look up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a situation is looking up, it is improving
look up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Now the summer’s here things are looking up!
look up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you look up information in a book, on a computer etc, you try to find it there
look up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Look the word up in your dictionary.
I’ll just look up the train times.
look up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to visit someone you know, especially when you are in the place where they live for a different reason
look up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Don’t forget to look me up when you come to Atlanta.
look up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if a situation is looking up, it is improving
look up.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Things are looking up for High Street retailers.
